summary: Professional portfolio + service-selling website for an AI-powered design business with modern minimal AI/tech aesthetic, showcasing services, pricing, portfolio, contact links, and an order/booking request flow.
architectural_notes: Target audience: content creators, YouTubers, influencers, and small businesses seeking affordable design services.
Design style: modern/minimal AI/tech theme; clean futuristic look with neon blue, purple, black palette.
Core pages: Home, Services (with pricing), Portfolio/Gallery, Contact (WhatsApp/email/Instagram), Order/Booking request flow.
Site must be mobile-friendly with easy navigation.
Brand/site name: "TechChandan AI Design" (reflect in header logo text and Home page title).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive site layout with global navigation (header/nav + footer) that links to: Home, Services, Portfolio, Contact, and Order/Booking.

Implement a cohesive modern, minimal, clean futuristic AI/tech visual theme across the entire site using the user’s preferred palette (neon blue, purple, black), with consistent typography, spacing, and component styling.

Build the Home page to introduce the brand and summarize the design services, including a hero section (headline + short description + primary call-to-action to Order/Booking) and a services preview section linking to the Services page.

Build the Services page listing all offerings—YouTube thumbnails, Instagram reel covers, social media posts, logo design, and banner/poster design—with clear pricing presentation and a per-service call-to-action to place an order (prefilling the selected service in the order form).

Build a Portfolio/Gallery page to display design samples with a responsive grid, category filtering (matching the service categories), and a lightweight detail view (modal or dedicated section) for viewing a sample larger with title and category.
Build a Contact page that displays and links out to WhatsApp, email, and Instagram, with the link targets configurable in a single frontend config/constants location.

Create an Order/Booking section (page or routed view) with a client request form that collects: name, email, preferred contact (WhatsApp/Instagram/email), service type, project description, deadline (optional), and budget range (optional).
Connect the Order/Booking form to the backend submit method using the project’s actor/agent pattern, and handle loading/error states gracefully.

Add a small, consistent set of static portfolio sample images and a brand mark to avoid an empty-looking initial site; store these assets in frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in Home (hero/brand) and Portfolio (sample thumbnails).
Update the site brand name everywhere it is displayed in the header logo text from "AI Design Studio" to "TechChandan AI Design".
Update the homepage hero title text to reflect the new brand name "TechChandan AI Design" while keeping the existing AI/tech styling (gradient emphasis) consistent with the current design.
Update site metadata to use the new brand name "TechChandan AI Design" (including the base HTML document <title> and the central site metadata/config used for branding text).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Home page introducing brand and summarizing services (modern AI/tech themed, mobile-friendly).
Create Services page listing offerings (YouTube thumbnails, Instagram reel covers, social posts, logo design, banner/poster design) with pricing.
Create Portfolio/Gallery page to display design samples.
Create Contact page with WhatsApp, email, and Instagram links.
Add Order/Booking section for clients to request work.
Implement site-wide modern, minimal, clean futuristic AI/tech styling (neon blue/purple/black), easy navigation, and responsive/mobile-first layout.
Implement backend support to receive and store order/booking requests, including a query method to list requests (for future use) and a submit method that persists each request with a timestamp.
Update website branding name to "TechChandan AI Design" (update header logo text and homepage title accordingly).
